item.description:
Moderately paced one-hour after-work hike around Risley Pond, Lake Street, Vernon, CT:
The Manchester Land Conservation Trust will lead a free hike on Friday, July 31 at 5:45 p.m., rain or shine at Risley Park, the Trust’s largest parcel of protected land. Children and families are especially welcome. The terrain is rocky, uneven, and sometimes wet, so hikers should wear sturdy shoes or boots.
Participants should park in the Lake Street lot across from Amy Drive on the north side of Risley Pond; additional parking is available along Amy Drive. Questions may be directed to Malcolm Barlow, President of the Trust, 860-646-4081. No dogs, please. Heavy rain or thunder cancels. Find out more about the Land Trust at www.manchesterlandtrust.org.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Risley pond after-work walk
